title: Intel
body:
**Intel** is the currency of the criminal underworld.

While cash buys you tools and bribes, **intel** opens doors that no amount of money can. It's the whispered tip about a security guard's shift change, the blueprint hidden in a dusty filing cabinet, the name of someone who knows someone.

In this world, {{neon_cyan}}knowledge is power{{/}}, and those who hoard it rise to the top. Every piece of intel you gather brings you closer to bigger scores, better connections, and jobs that lesser criminals can only dream about.

~~Keep your ears open and your eyes sharp.~~

title: Lockpick
body:
**Lockpicks** — the tools of the trade for anyone serious about B&E.

You bought this set from a {{soft_yellow}}"hobby shop"{{/}} that definitely wasn't asking questions. The clerk winked as they handed you the case: {{dim_gray}}"For educational purposes only, yeah?"{{/}}

Inside the worn leather pouch, you'll find a full set of tension wrenches, hooks, and rakes — everything you need to convince a lock that you're supposed to be on the other side of it.

It's amazing what doors open when you have the right tools. Literally.

~~just don't tell your mom where you got them~~
